      • spawn

        public boolean spawn(GameObject go)
        Spawns a GameObject at the map's default location. If default location is unavailable, another location will be found, until the whole map has been tried.
        Parameters:
        go - The object to spawn
        Returns:
        true if spawned successfully

      • spawn

        public boolean spawn(GameObject go,
                     java.awt.Point pos)
        Spawns a GameObject at a given location. If given location is unavailable, another location will be found, until the whole map has been tried. Returns true if object was spawned. False otherwise. Requires: Given Point must be a vaild point on the map.
        Parameters:
        go - The object to spawn
        pos - The location to spawn at
        Returns:
        true if spawned successfully

      • tick

        public void tick()
        Makes all NPCs in the map move. Should be called at a regular interval.
